definition: to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial

sentences.english: The animals were ruthlessly hunted to the verge of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 這些動物由於遭到無情的捕獵而瀕於滅絕。

sentences.english: The red wolf has federally endangered status throughout its 29-state historic range.
sentences.chinese: 紅狼在聯邦的29個州已經是瀕臨滅絕的物種。

sentences.english: The great auk is an extinct bird.
sentences.chinese: 大海雀是種滅絕的鳥類。

sentences.english: Rwanda was in the throes of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達陷於種族滅絕的陣痛。

sentences.english: Except it's difficult to analyze the genes of the extinct mosasaurs.
sentences.chinese: 分析已經滅絕的滄龍的基因是非常困難的。

sentences.english: The rhino, which is almost extinct, with its extraordinary horns and bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 犀牛，幾乎滅絕的物種，有着神奇的犀角和暴脾氣。

sentences.english: Orang are currently on the verge of extinction wildly.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩現在面臨着在野外滅絕的境地。

sentences.english: Reef gaps have marked each of the past five major mass extinctions.
sentences.chinese: 礁石中斷記錄了每一個的過去五年內主要物種的滅絕。

sentences.english: I have help getting protection now, because I was near extinction.
sentences.chinese: 現在我受到了保護，因爲我正瀕臨滅絕。

sentences.english: Currently, two male yellow-eyed penguins – an endangered species like the royal albatross – are incubating an egg.
sentences.chinese: 黃眼企鵝同皇家信天翁一樣，處在滅絕的邊緣。

sentences.english: This is further evidence that we are well on the way to the next great extinction event.
sentences.chinese: 這也進一步證明我們正在走向下一次大滅絕的厄運。

sentences.english: The most threatening change, from my perspective, is extermination of species.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，威脅最大的莫過於物種的滅絕。

sentences.english: The Nazi war criminals were condemned for crimes against humanity.
sentences.chinese: 納粹戰犯因其滅絕人性的罪行而被判刑。

sentences.english: Siberians are the most endangered of all cranes.
sentences.chinese: 白鶴是所有鶴類中最接近滅絕的。

sentences.english: Mother had gone away, I underwent the falling emptiness of reality and destructive grieves.
sentences.chinese: 母親不在了，我體味着真實的空落與滅絕一般的悲傷。

sentences.english: Ancient molecules can also expose relationships among long-dead species;
sentences.chinese: 古生代分子也可以揭示滅絕很久的物種之間的關係。

definition: to be eradicated/to vanish/extinct/to break off relations
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
